name: The Altar (kimproductions)
description:
"Hear my prayer, oh Holy One.

Bless me with the strength to rise

Against the forces of darkness."

The Altar is an atmospheric, spiritual tower defense game. Protect the holy statue against shadows emerging from the dark forest.

This is a demo, please comment any feedback or suggestions down below or DM me. If you're interested in project updates, follow me on instagram or check out my website.
